channel.title: DezNation - Minigames | Bosses | Dedi | Vote4Rewars | Webclient | Much more
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/logo-1.png[/img][/center]
http://www.deznation.net http://www.forums.deznation.net http://www.deznation.net/playnow.php
[center]DezNation Website - http://www.deznation.net DezNation Forums - http://www.deznation.net/xforum Play DezNation Now - http://www.deznation.net/playnow.php [/center]
[center]DezNation is a new and upcoming RSPS. We just started in July, 2012. We have a very active community.
Be sure to Register and start posting on the Forums and Vote as often as possible. Donations are appreciated and of course you will get some nice in-game features. Register now and fight, skill or post your way to the top!
[b] Guaranteed:[/b]
-Minigames -Bosses -Dicing -Dedicated Server -Webclient -Downloadable Client -Auto Donate -Pk Points System
Guaranteed:
-A combat system like no other, perfect dds specs with vesta, DH pking with accurate hits, and correct mage bonus's from items (SOL)
-Active PvM and PvP community, who would love to help boss/team with you, while on DezNation
-A helpful community and owner that will help you along your way to max combat.
-Great staff, that will help you in anyway they can
-Bosses that will make you panic as you try and gobble down some food
-A sense of accomplishment as you finally hit your first 99 skill
-A great economy that is booming, for a server that has just recently started up
-Active forums that will keep you entertained even if your not on the server itself
-Perfect and unique mini-games such as Pyramid Plunder and Barrows
-Custom made Dominion Tower used to gain Chaotic weapons and much more
-Rewarding skilling, such as Herblore, for Overloads and Extremes
-A competitive server, with working high scores, with lots of active players!
Donator Benefits:
Becoming a donator has its benefits, but many of you will be wonder what kinds of benefits
-Donator cape that increases your strength by +2 and allows you to show off your support for the server!
-Opportunities to buy some donator items from the donator shop, such as AGS hilt and rares!
-Yell Command and access to the donator area with donator skilling area
-A sense of helpfulness knowing you helped out a up and coming server, hoping that it will one day succeed!
Thats just for regular donators however, players who donate more than 20$ will have much, much more benefits!
Forum features:
Our forum is THE place if you want to become part of the community. You can always drop by and leave an introduction, chat with fellow players in our shoutbox or even talk with them via our Ventrilo. Become an active member and join a clan, post your accomplishments,
and even create a guide to help out the newer players along! One of the ways to earn Loyalty Points is to post guides,
So get to it!
There are some other features of our forum such as:
-Appeal/Report player section
-Active Clan registration/Pking section -Announcements to keep you updated daily on the improvements we make
-Giveaways including in-game cash, and sometimes rare weapons! -General discussion: for your daily talk about DezNation -Help section: if you have any issues while trying to play DezNation or ingame issues, feel free to post here so we can help out -Donator Section[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/screens2.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/cape.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/chaosele.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/claws.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/skilling.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/cw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/cws.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/quest.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/screens3.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/dzone.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/dom.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/rng.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/TD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/nomad.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/corp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/ss2012-08-19at040252.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/rng.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/sumshop.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/scrollcreation.png[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy224/buhrock/pouchcreationn.png[/img]
